It's bound to work better than spending a day figuring out why MC1 thinks MC2 is an arse, and then ending up changing it all while writing..
I've been wondering whether plotting would work better for me if I wrote scene cards that said: "MC1 thinks MC2 is an arse."  and vice versa
As much as I've come to love plotting, I tend to get lost in details and technicalities, and overthink things. It's hard to find balance.
